channel.title: Need help with a Code
channel.description:
Ok so i tried making a Admin Command, Wich worked out good untill, It kept saying when i Compile:
[tt]client.java:16238: 'else' without 'if' else if <playerRights=0>[/tt]
Anyone know how to fix this error?

item.title: Need help with a Code
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

if (condition) {
//action
} else {
//default action
}
